description: Here’s everything you need to know about joining our Minecraft server.
mainContent: This page explains how to connect to our Minecraft server. Please follow the steps carefully!

subTopics.title: How di I join the server?
subTopics.content: First, you'll need a Minecraft account and the latest version of the game. Go to the official Minecraft website to download it.

subTopics.title: How to Get Minecraft?
subTopics.content: If you don’t have Minecraft yet, simply follow the official download link to get started. You can choose from Java Edition or Bedrock Edition.
